markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 328 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Imperial](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=9)

**Deities**
[Alseta](/Deities.aspx?ID=30), [Eiseth](/Deities.aspx?ID=169)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you—even if you're carrying it in an [extradimensional](/Traits.aspx?ID=67) container—the spell is lost.

---
**Heightened (5th)** The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.
name: Dimension Door
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 328 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Imperial](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=9)

**Deities**
[Alseta](/Deities.aspx?ID=30), [Eiseth](/Deities.aspx?ID=169)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Teleport yourself up to 120 feet.
</summary>
text: Dimension Door Source Core Rulebook pg. 328 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Bloodline Imperial Deities Alseta, Eiseth Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 120 feet --- Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you—even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container—the spell is lost. --- Heightened (5th) The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.
